function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of dialogue between individual contributors","Impact":"Limited exchange of ideas and potential collaboration, leading to isolated work and potential duplication of efforts","Mitigation":"Establish regular communication channels, encourage open dialogue, and schedule collaborative meetings","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication tools, and project management software","People":"Individual contributors, project managers, and team leaders","Owner":"Project managers, team leaders, and senior stakeholders"},{"Description":"Neglect of communication and dialogue in organizing cities and lives","Impact":"Reduced sense of community, misinterpretation of meanings, and ineffective organization of urban environments","Mitigation":"Promote community engagement, establish effective communication strategies, and prioritize dialogue in urban planning and development","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, urban planning software, and communication tools","People":"Urban planners, community leaders, and local residents","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and community development organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate use of podcasting and radio as research dissemination methods","Impact":"Limited reach and impact of research findings, diminished engagement with academic and public audiences","Mitigation":"Provide training on podcasting and radio production, promote diverse dissemination methods, and integrate audio media into research communication strategies","Technologies":"Podcasting tools, audio recording equipment, and research dissemination platforms","People":"Academic researchers, media scholars, and research communicators","Owner":"Research institutions, academic departments, and media organizations"}]}
